# Claude MCP Community (www.claudemcp.com)

> www.claudemcp.com is a community website for Model Context Protocol (MCP). It serves as a central hub for MCP documentation, server directory, client information, and community resources. The site aims to provide developers and users with comprehensive information about the MCP ecosystem.

This website is built with Next.js and supports multiple languages (English, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese). This file is designed to help Large Language Models (LLMs) understand the content and structure of the site.

## Core Content (Servers, Clients, Docs, Blogs)

## Optional
